content: --वनं a mass of rays or light.

भावन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [भू-णिच्-ल्यु ल्युट् वा] Effecting &c.; see भावक above. --नः {@--1@} An efficient cause. {@--2@} A creator. <ls>Māl. 9. 4.</ls> {@--3@} An epithet of Śiva; {@--4@} Of Viṣṇu. --नं, --ना {@--1@} Creating, manifesting. {@--2@} Promoting any one's interests. {@--3@} Conception, imagination, fancy, thought, idea; मधुरिपुरहमिति भावनशीला <ls>Gīt. 6</ls>; or भावनया त्वयि लीना <ls n="Gīt.">4</ls>; <ls>Pt. 3. 162.</ls> {@--4@} Feeling of devotion, faith; <ls>Pt. 5. 105.</ls> {@--5@} Meditation, contemplation, abstract meditation. {@--6@} A supposition, hypothesis. {@--7@} Observing, investigating. {@--8@} Settling, determining; <ls>Y. 2. 149.</ls> {@--9@} Remembering, recollection. {@--10@} Direct knowledge, perception or cognition. {@--11@} The cause of memory which arises from direct perception (in logic); see भावना and स्मृति in <ls>T. S.</ls> {@--12@} Proof, demonstration, argument. {@--13@} Steeping, infusion, saturating a dry powder with fluid. {@--14@} Scenting; decorating with flowers and perfumes. {@--15@} (In arith.) Finding by combination or composition. {@--16@} Nature, essence (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>). --ना {@--1@} A crow. {@--2@} Water. --नं Apprehension, perception.
